description: This is a modern 'Prometheus' dashboard for your Kubernetes cluster(s). Made for kube-prometheus-stack and take advantage of the latest Grafana features. GitHub repository: https://github.com/dotdc/grafana-dashboards-kubernetes

panels.title: Config - Last Successful Reload by pod
TSDB Head Series & Chunks by pod
TSDB Head samples appended - rate by pod
TSDB Rate of Compactions by pod
TSDB Created & Deleted series by pod
Engine Query Duration by pod, slice

targets.expr: sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{pod=~"(prometheus-.*|alertmanager-.*)", pod!~".*loki.*", pod!~".*minio.*", pod!~".*promtail.*", image!="", container!="", cluster=~"$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod, container)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{pod=~"(prometheus-.*|alertmanager-.*)", pod!~".*loki.*", pod!~".*minio.*", pod!~".*promtail.*", image!="", container!="", cluster=~"$cluster"}) by (pod, container)

panels.title: Persistent Volumes - Capacity and usage in %
Persistent Volumes - Capacity and usage in bytes

title: Monitoring System / Prometheus
